attributes.action: Reduse the driving time and protect the Drivers of Psv Busses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think that Gordon Brown should help to reduse the drivers hours when driving Psv Busses drivers are still finding it hard to stay a wake when driving under Domestic hours. Also there should be a law to protect bus drivers from assult from passangers. Emergency services have this in place so why not bus drivers
